```{r}

```

```{r}
m = neuralnet(eruptions ~ waiting, data = faithful, hidden = 3)

```

```{r}
pred = compute(m, faithful[,-1])
plot(eruptions ~ ., data = faithful)
plot(pred$net.result ~ faithful$waiting)
plot(pred$net.result ~ faithful$eruptions)
```
